DOC.brief_summary: Increased postprandial plasma triglyceride associate increase cardiovascular risk . Chronic consumption carbohydrate associate increased level triglyceride . Very study assess effect acute consumption carbohydrates plasma triglyceride lipoprotein production clearance . The present study aim assess effect acute administration glucose fructose hepatic intestinal lipoprotein production .
DOC.brief_title: Regulation Intestinal Hepatic Lipoprotein Production Glucose Fructose
DOC.detailed_description: Each subject study twice 4-6 week apart random order single blind study . A nasoduodenal tube sit fluoroscopic guidance day prior study.In study A receive intraduodenal intralipid ( 20 % 60 ml/hour ) alongside 60 ml/hour 20 % dextrose fructose 15 hour start 4am . In study B receive 60 ml/hour intraduodenal intralipid 60ml/hour normal saline 15 hour 4am . A pancreatic clamp ( octreotide replacement glucose , insulin , glucagon growth hormone ) start 7am . From 9am iv bolus deuterated-glycerol ( d5-glycerol ) along regular infusion deuterated leucine ( L- [ 5,5,5-2H3 ] . Regular blood sample draw assess lipoprotein kinetics .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman , age 18 60 year 2 . Body mass index 20 kg/m2 27 kg/m2 3 . Hemoglobin 130g/L . 4 . Normal glucose tolerance response 75g , 2hr OGTT 1 . Subject history hepatitis/hepatic disease active within previous two year . 2 . Any significant active ( past 12 month ) disease gastrointestinal , pulmonary , neurological , renal ( Cr > 1.5 mg/dL ) , genitourinary , hematological system , severe uncontrolled treated untreated hypertension ( sit diastolic BP > 100 systolic > 180 ) proliferative retinopathy 3 . History diabetes OGTT indicative diabetes impair glucose tolerance . 4 . Any history MI clinically significant , active , cardiovascular history include history arrhythmia 's conduction delay ECG , unstable angina , decompensated heart failure . 5 . Any laboratory value : AST > 2x ULN ; ALT > 2x ULN TSH > 6 mU/l 6 . Current addiction alcohol substance abuse determine investigator . 7 . Mental incapacity , unwillingness language barrier preclude adequate understanding cooperation 8 . Taking prescription nonprescription medication time study 9 . Having donate blood three month prior three month post study procedures 10 . A pregnancy test perform 1 3 day prior study female subject . Those test positive pregnancy exclude .
